last_episode_to_air.name: The Pastor’s Secrets
last_episode_to_air.overview: Churchgoers know something is up when pastor Matthew Winkler doesn’t show up for services: he’s found dead on his bedroom floor and twisted sex fantasies and dark family secrets start to surface.

name: Sex and Murder
overview: Sex and murder are often tied together in criminal investigations; and detectives uncover dirty secrets, scandalous sex affairs, online sex addictions, jealousy and stunning twisted fantasies when looking for motives for murder.
